price: 22. C’est Lui, Allah. Il n’y a point d’autre divinité que Lui. Il Connaît aussi bien les choses insondables que les choses observables, et c’est Lui le Tout Clément, le Tout Miséricordieux.
arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati huwa al-raḥmānu al-raḥīmu
